entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
